code: export var getPersons=function getPersons(){return fetch('https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character').then(function(initial){return initial.json().then(function(json){return initial.ok?Promise.resolve(json):Promise.reject(json);});});};export var getNewPersons=function getNewPersons(newPersons){return fetch("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/?page=".concat(newPersons)).then(function(initial){return initial.json().then(function(json){return initial.ok?Promise.resolve(json):Promise.reject(json);});});};export var getNamePersons=function getNamePersons(namePersons,status){return fetch("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/?name=".concat(namePersons,"&status=").concat(status)).then(function(initial){return initial.json().then(function(json){return initial.ok?Promise.resolve(json):Promise.reject(json);});});};export var getEpisodes=function getEpisodes(number){return fetch("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/episode").then(function(initial){return initial.json().then(function(json){return initial.ok?Promise.resolve(json):Promise.reject(json);});});};export var getRamdonPersons=function getRamdonPersons(number){return fetch("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/".concat(number)).then(function(initial){return initial.json().then(function(json){return initial.ok?Promise.resolve(json):Promise.reject(json);});});};
